title: Lunchbox’s Wife Involved In A Hit and Run Accident! + Who Is Invited To Bobby's Wedding? + Someone On The Show Has To Make A Decision About Kids
itunes:title: Lunchbox’s Wife Involved In A Hit and Run Accident! + Who Is Invited To Bobby's Wedding? + Someone On The Show Has To Make A Decision About Kids
description:
Lunchbox tells us about his wife being shaken up after she was side swiped on the highway. Raymundo holds a press conference to ask burning questions about Bobby’s wedding from when we need to clear our calendars to if everyone from the show is invited. Lunchbox won $25 on a scratch off that someone sent to the studio…except it’s in Florida. So he called to see if they could mail him one of those BIG winner checks. Someone on the show reveals their plans of having kids.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
